meanings.definition: The act of making oneself appear more stylish or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: His dandification with the new suit impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours on her dandification before the important event.
meanings.sent3: His dandification for the costume party made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her dandification was like a work of art, carefully crafted and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The dandification of the mannequins in the store window caught the eye of every passerby.

meanings.definition: The process of grooming oneself to look more refined or elegant.
meanings.sent1: After his dandification, he felt more confident and poised.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the dandification ritual before special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's dandification after grooming was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The dandification of the garden transformed it into a beautiful oasis.
meanings.sent5: Her dandification routine involved meticulous attention to every detail.
